subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Spain dealt comfortably enough with Honduras. But beating one of its former colonies is far from proof that the Spaniards are anywhere near to being the potential world champion we thought they might be.
snippet: Spain dealt comfortably enough with Honduras. But beating one of its former colonies is far from proof that the Spaniards are anywhere near to being the potential world champion we thought they might be.
